comments:
scenario of bug 94914 works fine but getting bogus by invoking at History veiw. 

Platform: WindowsVista Business Japanese
Driver: I20070410-1043

Steps to recreate
1. create new CVS server repository connection for UTF-8 encoded cvs on RHEL4
2. change the Server encoding to UTF-8 from default (MS932) at the Properties
3. Check out a Java project
4. At Java Perspective, change the Java project file encoding to UTF-8 from 
default MS932
5. edit edit a java program and save it
6. Select Show in > History at the context menu
7. Select Compare at the History view

Result
here is the error stack.

The problem I saw was due to the fact that I didn't set the encoding of my OS.
